parameters.name: input_files
parameters.desc: BAM/SAM/CRAM file containing reads  This argument must be specified at least once.

parameters.name: variant_file
parameters.desc: File to which variants should be written

parameters.name: f1r2_file
parameters.desc: If specified, collect F1R2 counts and output files into this tar.gz file  Default value: null.

parameters.name: tumor_sample_name
parameters.desc: BAM sample name of tumor.  May be URL-encoded as output by GetSampleName with -encode argument.  Default value: null.

parameters.name: normal_sample_name
desc: BAM sample name of normal(s), if any.  May be URL-encoded as output by GetSampleName with
-encode argument.  This argument may be specified 0 or more times. Default value: null.

parameters.name: native_pair_hmm_threads
parameters.desc: How many threads should a native pairHMM implementation use  Default value: 4.
